Verses: 1 aadhalaal, Enakkup Piriyamum Vaanjaiyumaana Sagodharare, Enakku Sandhoshamum Kireedamumaanavargale, Piriyamaanavargale, Indhappadiye Karththarukkul Nilaiththirungal.
2 karththarukkul Ore Sindhaiyaayirukka Eyodhiyaalukkum Sindhikeyaalukkum Buththisollugiren.

3 andriyum, En Uththama Koottaaliye, Avargalukku Udhaviyaayirukkumpadi Unnaiyum Vendikkolgiren; Avargal Kilemendhodum Matra En Udanvelaiyaatkalodungooda Suvisesha Vishayaththil Ennodekooda Migavum Pirayaasappattaargal, Avargaludaiya Naamangal Jeevapusthagaththil Irukkiradhu.
4 karththarukkul Eppozhudhum Sandhoshamaayirungal; Sandhoshamaayirungal Endru Marupadiyum Sollugiren.
5 ungal Saandhagunam Ellaa Manusharukkum Therindhiruppadhaaga. Karththar Sameebamaayirukkiraar.
6 neengal Ondrukkung Kavalaippadaamal, Ellaavatraiyunguriththu Ungal Vinnappangalai Sthoththiraththode Koodiya Jebaththinaalum Vendudhalinaalum Dhevanukkuth Theriyappaduththungal.
7 appozhudhu, Ellaap Buththikkummelaana Dhevasamaadhaanam Ungal Irudhayangalaiyum Ungal Sindhaigalaiyum Kiristhu Yesuvukkullaagak Kaaththukkollum.

8 kadaisiyaaga, Sagodharare, Unmaiyullavaigalevaigalo, Ozhukkamullavaigalevaigalo, Needhiyullavaigalevaigalo, Karpullavaigalevaigalo, Anbullavaigalevaigalo, Narkeerththiyullavaigalevaigalo, Punniyam Edhuvo, Pukazh Edhuvo Avaigalaiye Sindhiththukkondirungal.
9 neengal Ennidaththil Katrum Adaindhum Kettum Kandum Irukkiravaigalevaigalo Avaigalaiye Seyyungal; Appozhudhu Samaadhaanaththin Dhevan Ungalodiruppaar.

10 ennai Visaarippadharku Neengal Ippozhudhu Marupadiyum Manamalarndhapadiyinaale Karththarukkul Migavum Sandhoshappatten; Ippadich Seyya Ennangondirundheergal, Samayammaaththiram Ungalukku Neridavillai.
11 en Kuraichchalinaal Naan Ippadi Sollugiradhillai; Enenil Naan Endha Nilaimaiyilirundhaalum Manarammiyamaayirukkak Katrukkonden.

12 thaazhndhirukkavum Enakkuth Theriyum, Vaazhndhirukkavum Enakkuth Theriyum; Evvidaththilum Ellaavatrilum Thirupthiyaayirukkavum Pattiniyaayirukkavum, Paripooranamadaiyavum Kuraivupadavum Bodhikkappatten.
13 ennaip Belappaduththugira Kiristhuvinaale Ellaavatraiyunjseyya Enakkup Belanundu.
14 aagilum Neengal En Ubaththiravaththil Ennode Udanpattadhu Nalamaayirukkiradhu.

15 melum, Pilippiyare, Suviseshaththin Aarambaththile Naan Makkedhoniyaavilirundhu Purappattabodhu, Kodukkal Vaangal Kaariyaththil Neengalmaaththiram Enakku Udanpattadheyallaamal, Veroru Sabaiyum Udanpadavillai Endru Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
16 naan Thesalonikkeyilirundhabodhum, En Kuraichchalai Neekkumpadi Neengal Irandorudharam Anuppineergal.
17 ubagaaraththai Naan Naadaamal, Ungal Kanakkukkup Balan Perugumpadiye Naadugiren.

18 ellaam Enakkuk Kidaiththadhu, Paripooranamum Undaayirukkiradhu; Ungalaal Anuppappattavaigalai Sugandhavaasanaiyum Dhevanukku Piriyamaana Sugandha Baliyumaaga Eppaappirotheeththuvin Kaiyil Varappatrikkondapadiyaal Naan Thirupthiyadaindhirukkiren.
19 en Dhevan Thammudaiya Aisuvariyaththinpadi Ungal Kuraivaiyellaam Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Magimaiyile Niraivaakkuvaar.
20 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaanavarukku Endrendraikkum Magimai Undaavadhaaga. Aamen.
21 kiristhu Yesuvukkullaana Parisuththavaangal Yaavarukkum Vaazhththudhal Sollungal. Ennodirukkira Sagodharargal Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
22 parisuththavaangal Anaivarum, Viseshamaaga Raayanudaiya Aramanaiyilullavargalum Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
23 namadhu Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungalanaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
